Austin Community Reinvestment Co-op

We aim to harness the power of socially conscious investors who want to create more housing cooperatives in Austin; and the passion of individuals like yourself that want to spread the joy of cooperative living.


Watch video

What's ACRC?

The Austin Community Reinvestment Cooperative is a co-op entity that leases land to housing co-ops, and provides technical support to ensure the co-op is a success. We help our residents build the kind of wealth that comes with home ownership by offering a model in which your monthly rent contributes towards partial ownership of the house which can be sold when you leave.
groups

Community

We offer funding to secure a house in which you can grow your new community of housemates and govern yourselves.

price_change

Wealth

Real estate funding is accessible and affordable with no large down payments. We care about communities, not cash flow.

cottage

Home

If you can see yourself living in a happy community, and taking care of both peers and property, we are your perfect match.
